headline.main: BERLIN CONCEDES CHECK IN CRIMEA; Drive on Sevastopol is Halted and Push for Kerch Slowed, German Reports Admit

lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Nov. 10 -- German reports tonight admit bitter Soviet resistance and a series of counter-attacks by the Red Army near Sevastopol, in contrast with previous German claims that Soviet resistance in Crimea had been crushed and the operations converted into a pursuit.
